titleStmt.title: Nicholas Machiavel's letter to Zanobius Buondelmontius in vindication of himself and his writings..
titleStmt.author: Neville, Henry, 1620-1694.
Machiavelli, Niccolò, 1469-1527.
Wharton, Thomas Wharton, Marquess of, 1648?-1715.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and suggested approximate date from Wing.
"The letter is supposititious; it was probably written by Henry Neville"--BM. Authorship sometimes but less probably attributed to Thomas Wharton.

Likely part of: Publisher or translator of Nicholas Machiavels whole works out of Italian, faithfully into English, concerning the following letter of Nicholas Machiavels, wherein he clears himself of the aspersions alledg'd by some on his writings.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
